item.title: 日元有望创下近15个月来最佳单周表现
item.description: 日元周五有望创下近15个月来最佳周表现，此前日本首相高市早苗赢得历史性选举胜利，缓解了投资者对该国财政状况的担忧，日元汇率由此持续攀升。【原文：The yen was set for its best week in almost 15 months on Friday, having climbed steadily after Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's historic election win allayed investor worries about the nation's fiscal health.】

item.title: 美国法院叫停合并披露规则扩容
item.description: 德克萨斯州一名美国联邦法官周四叫停了一项扩大企业合并审查信息提交范围的规则，称该规则超出了联邦贸易委员会的职权范围。【原文：A U.S. federal judge in Texas on Thursday blocked a rule that expanded the amount of information companies have to turn over when seeking a merger review, saying it exceeded the Federal Trade Commission's authority.】

item.title: 埃利奥特重申反对丰田工业收购要约，股价创历史新高
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司周五表示，不会按当前条款将其持有的丰田工业股份提交至延长的要约收购中，并强烈建议其他股东效仿此举。【原文：Elliott Investment Management on Friday said it will not tender its Toyota Industries shares into an extended tender offer at current terms and strongly encouraged other shareholders to follow suit.】

item.title: 美联储政策比预期更紧缩，通胀并非问题，米兰表示
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬·米兰周四表示，美联储当前的货币政策立场威胁到美国经济增长，而该增长本应由特朗普政府包括减税在内的一系列政策提供支撑。他再次阐述了进一步降息的必要性。【原文：The Federal Reserve's current monetary-policy setting threatens U.S. economic growth that otherwise is being "underwritten" by a range of Trump administration policies including tax cuts, Fed Governor Stephen Miran said on Thursday as he again laid out the case for more interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 据消息人士透露，耐克旗下品牌匡威将调整业务布局并缩减企业员工规模。
item.description: 知情人士周四向路透社透露，耐克旗下品牌匡威正裁减企业职能岗位，以使其运营模式与母公司这家运动服饰巨头保持一致。【原文：Nike-owned Converse is cutting corporate roles as it aligns its operating model with its sportswear giant parent, a source familiar with the development told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 全球电动汽车销量受中国、美国一月放缓拖累
item.description: 咨询机构Benchmark Mineral Intelligence（BMI）周五发布的数据显示，受中国推出购置税政策及降低电动汽车补贴、美国政策调整等因素影响，1月份全球电动汽车注册量下降3%。【原文：Global EV registrations fell 3% in January as the introduction of a purchase tax and lower EV subsidies in China and policy changes in the U.S. hindered sales, data by consultancy Benchmark Mineral Intelligence (BMI) showed on Friday.】

item.title: 宾州州长称PJM将延长容量拍卖价格上限两年
item.description: 宾夕法尼亚州州长乔希·夏皮罗周四在X平台发文称，在该州采取法律行动后，电网运营商PJM互联公司已同意将其容量拍卖的价格上限再延长两年。【原文：Grid operator PJM Interconnection has agreed to extend a price cap on its capacity auctions for another two years following legal action by the state, Pennsylvania Governor Josh Shapiro said in a post on X on Thursday.】

item.title: 彭博社报道称，金融科技公司Clear Street推迟美国IPO计划
item.description: 彭博社周四报道，华尔街经纪商Clear Street已推迟其在美国首次公开募股（IPO）的计划。这是本周第二家推迟上市的公司，表明IPO市场正面临新一轮波动。【原文：Wall Street broker Clear Street has postponed its U.S. initial public offering, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, marking the second delayed listing in a week as the IPO market faces another bout of volatility.】

item.title: 独家：萨克斯债权方与供应商正协商避免就破产贷款问题诉诸法庭
item.description: 知情人士透露，为避免法庭诉讼，谈判代表正争分夺秒解决一项争议：价值数百万美元的奢侈品手袋、服装和珠宝能否作为萨克斯百货公司17.5亿美元破产贷款的抵押品。【原文：Hoping to avert a court battle, negotiators are racing to resolve a dispute over whether millions of dollars in luxury handbags, clothing and jewelry could be claimed as collateral for Saks' $1.75 billion bankruptcy loan, people familiar with the talks said.】

item.title: 淡水河谷因镍资产减值录得38亿美元季度亏损
item.description: 巴西矿业巨头淡水河谷周四公布，其第四季度净亏损较2024年同期扩大，主要源于加拿大镍资产减值及税务影响。【原文：Brazilian miner Vale on Thursday reported that its fourth-quarter net loss widened versus the same period of 2024, citing an impairment of nickel assets in Canada and a tax effect.】

item.title: 泰勒·斯威夫特要求美国政府阻止"Swift Home"商标注册
item.description: 流行乐坛巨星泰勒·斯威夫特已向美国专利商标局提出申请，要求阻止某床上用品公司注册包含"Swift Home"字样的联邦商标，理由是该商标会误导消费者。【原文：Pop superstar Taylor Swift has asked the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office to block a bedding company from securing a federal trademark featuring the phrase "Swift Home," arguing it would confuse shoppers.】

item.title: 赌场运营商永利因拉斯维加斯业务疲软未达季度预期
item.description: 赌场运营商永利度假村周四公布的第四季度利润未达华尔街预期，其拉斯维加斯业务及其他地区物业的业绩疲软是主要原因。【原文：Casino operator Wynn Resorts missed Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, hurt by weaker performance in its Las Vegas business and other regional properties.】

item.title: 卡车运输类股下跌，因人工智能担忧施压
item.description: 卡车运输和物流公司股价周四下跌，该行业成为最新遭受冲击的领域——市场担忧快速发展的AI技术将加剧对传统企业的竞争压力，这些企业长期依赖软件提供服务。【原文：Shares of trucking and logistics companies sank on Thursday, the latest industry to be sideswiped by worries that quickly advancing AI technology will lead to increased competition for established firms that rely on software for their services.】

item.title: 中国国有企业收购法拍房以延缓市场下行
item.description: 中国国有企业正收购被止赎的房地产项目，这表明政府为缓解受危机冲击的房地产市场严重供过于求问题而长期承诺的举措终于开始见效，尽管进展缓慢。【原文：Chinese state-owned companies are buying foreclosed property projects, in a sign that long-promised government efforts to reduce massive oversupply in the crisis-hit housing sector are finally getting traction, albeit at a slow pace.】

item.title: 据《综艺》报道，CBS新闻正考虑新一轮裁员，可能裁减至少15%的员工。
item.description: 据《综艺》周四报道，CBS新闻正考虑新一轮裁员，可能涉及至少15%的现有员工。该报道援引三位知情人士的消息称。【原文：CBS News is considering a new round of layoffs that could see cuts totaling at least 15% of the current staff, Variety reported on Thursday, citing three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 苹果在第三次庭审中成功抵御4G无线专利诉讼
item.description: 苹果公司周四在一场诉讼中赢得胜诉判决，此前知识产权管理公司Optis Wireless指控这家科技巨头侵犯其4G无线技术专利权。【原文：Apple won a defense verdict on Thursday in a lawsuit by intellectual-property management company Optis Wireless, which had accused the tech giant of violating its patent rights in 4G wireless technology.】

item.title: 美国发布临时税收抵免规则，旨在限制中国清洁能源领域影响力
item.description: 美国财政部周四公布了临时规定，旨在执行特朗普总统新税法中限制企业申领联邦清洁能源补贴的条款——若企业过度依赖中国制造商品，则不得申领该补贴。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department on Thursday unveiled interim rules for enforcing provisions in President Donald Trump's new tax law that restrict companies from claiming federal clean energy subsidies if they are overly reliant on Chinese-made goods.】

item.title: Arista Networks预测营收将大幅增长，因AI加速提升需求，股价应声上涨
item.description: 网络设备供应商Arista Networks周四预测全年营收将超出华尔街预期，押注数据中心扩张将推动其电子硬件需求持续增长，其股价在盘后交易中上涨逾17%。【原文：Networking equipment provider Arista Networks forecast annual revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, betting on steady demand for its electronic hardware amid the expanding presence of data centers, sending its shares up more than 17% in extended trading.】

item.title: 彭博社报道称，OpenAI指控DeepSeek通过提取美国模型获取竞争优势
item.description: 据彭博社周四援引OpenAI内部备忘录报道，该公司已向美国立法者发出警告，称中国人工智能初创企业DeepSeek正采用复杂手段从美国领先的人工智能模型中提取结果，用于训练其下一代R1聊天机器人。【原文：OpenAI has warned U.S. lawmakers that Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek is using sophisticated methods to extract results from leading U.S. AI models to train the next generation of its R1 chatbot, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing a company memo.】

item.title: Expedia预测2026年预订量将因企业客户需求而保持乐观
item.description: 在线旅游平台Expedia周四预测，2026年总预订量和营收将超出华尔街预期，押注于企业客户的强劲需求。【原文：Online travel platform Expedia forecast 2026 gross bookings and revenue above Wall Street expectations on Thursday, betting on strong demand from business clients.】

item.title: 加拿大航空预测2026年核心利润将超预期，得益于国际需求强劲
item.description: 加拿大航空周四预测2026年核心利润将超出华尔街预期，得益于美国以外国际航线需求强劲以及高端旅行需求激增。【原文：Air Canada forecast 2026 core profit above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, boosted by strong demand on international routes outside the U.S. and a surge in premium travel.】

item.title: 科罗娜啤酒制造商星座品牌公司任命尼古拉斯·芬克为新任首席执行官
item.description: 星座品牌公司周四宣布任命尼古拉斯·芬克为首席执行官，接替比尔·纽兰兹的职位。此举正值这家啤酒制造商面临需求压力之际。【原文：Constellation Brands said on Thursday it appointed Nicholas Fink as its top boss, replacing Bill Newlands, as the beermaker battles demand pressures.】

item.title: 美台敲定协议：削减关税，增加美国商品采购
item.description: 特朗普政府官员签署了最终互惠贸易协议，确认对台湾进口商品征收15%的关税，同时要求台湾方面承诺逐步取消或降低对几乎所有美国商品的关税。【原文：Officials from the Trump administration signed a final agreement on reciprocal trade that confirms a 15% U.S. tariff rate for imports from Taiwan, while committing Taiwan to a schedule for eliminating or lowering tariffs on nearly all U.S. goods.】

item.title: 花旗集团首席执行官简·弗雷泽薪酬上涨22%，达4200万美元
item.description: 花旗集团周四宣布，已批准首席执行官简·弗雷泽2025年总薪酬为4200万美元，较上年增长近22%。【原文：Citigroup said on Thursday it had approved $42 million for CEO Jane Fraser's 2025 total compensation, up nearly 22% year over year.】

item.title: 纽约联储的雷马什表示，美联储高强度的债券购买计划将持续至4月中旬
item.description: 纽约联储一位协助管理货币政策实施的官员周四表示，美联储正按计划推进大规模国库券购买计划直至春季，但年度纳税申报截止日之后的政策走向尚不明朗。【原文：The Federal Reserve is on track to continue forward with sizable Treasury bill buying into the spring but it is unclear what happens after the annual tax filing date has passed, an official who helps manage the implementation of monetary policy at the New York Fed said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国主导的委内瑞拉石油销售将在数月内带来50亿美元收入，能源主管赖特向NBC新闻透露
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯·赖特周四向美国全国广播公司新闻频道透露，美国控制的委内瑞拉石油销售额迄今已突破10亿美元，未来数月还将再创50亿美元收入。【原文：Oil sales from Venezuela controlled by the U.S. have totaled over $1 billion so far and in the next few months will bring in another $5 billion, U.S. Secretary of Energy Chris Wright told NBC News on Thursday.】

item.title: 巴西牛肉加工量创纪录，因中国牛肉消费量激增
item.description: 巴西国家统计局周四发布的初步数据显示，该国第四季度牛肉屠宰量较2024年同期增长13.1%，屠宰企业大幅提升了加工量。【原文：Brazil's cattle slaughtering activity for the fourth quarter shows beef packers boosted processing by 13.1% from the same period in 2024, according to preliminary Brazilian census bureau data released on Thursday.】

item.title: Coinbase因加密货币交易放缓意外亏损
item.description: 加密货币交易所Coinbase周四意外公布季度亏损，这是自2023年第三季度以来首次出现亏损，原因是数字资产普遍抛售期间交易量萎缩对其造成冲击。【原文：Coinbase posted a surprise quarterly loss on Thursday, marking its first since the third quarter of 2023, as the cryptocurrency exchange was hit by weaker trading volumes during a period of broad digital-asset selloff.】

item.title: Instacart预测本季度业绩强劲，主要得益于必需品需求和广告业务的推动。
item.description: Instacart周四公布的财报显示，受线上配送平台生活必需品需求强劲及广告收入增长推动，公司本季度总交易额和核心利润均超出预期，并超越了对第四季度的预测。【原文：Instacart forecast current-quarter gross transaction value and core profit above expectations and beat fourth-quarter estimates on Thursday, helped by strong demand for essentials on its online delivery platform and rising advertising revenue.】

item.title: Pinterest营收预期下调，数字广告市场竞争激烈；股价暴跌
item.description: Pinterest周四公布的季度营收预测低于市场预期，凸显出这家图片分享平台在与财力雄厚平台争夺广告收入时持续面临的困境，其股价在盘后交易中下跌12%。【原文：Pinterest forecast first-quarter revenue below estimates on Thursday, underscoring the image-sharing platform's ongoing struggle to compete for advertising dollars against deep-pocketed platforms, sending its shares down 12% in extended trading.】
